title: ‘Destiny 2’ Fails To Fix Its Easiest Problem With Its Latest Patch

title: Galaxy S26 leak hints at iPhone-like design, Qi2 magnets
description: A new leak of Samsung's Galaxy S26 series hints at an iPhone-like design for the Edge, and the potential arrival of Qi2 magnets.
body:
A new leaked image of the Galaxy S26 series reveals that, finally, Samsung seems to be adopting Qi2 magnets, but also potentially copying the design of Apple’s upcoming iPhone 17 series.

title: Hue takes on cheaper rivals with the entry-level Essential smart bulb lineup
description: Hue just did its biggest product launch ever as part of IFA 2025, and a key product is the new entry-level Essential smart bulb lineup.

title: AI chatbots are not your friends
description: Lonely people are turning to AI chatbots for friendship and romance, but it's an emotional trap.
body:
I know about being lonely. It sucks. I’m far from alone. As a people, we’ve been growing increasingly lonely; we’ve turned more and more inward.
This isn’t new. We’ve been doing it since at least the ’90s, as Robert Putnam described in his book Bowli... [608 chars]
